participant_1.background:
I love listening to Tool while I'm working on my stamp collection and taking care of my dogs.
my idol is thierry henry.
I have a computer that can play rap music loudly so I can dance with my dog.
i don t drink alcohol.
my favorite season is winter.

participant_2.background:
I work from home, and it allows me to spend a lot of time with my dog.
I'm proud of my ability to persevere through difficult times and continue to succeed in my career.
My most exotic place was in the mountains of Nepal where I went hiking and got to see the Himalayas.
I treasure my dog, Petrucci, more than anything else.
I get nervous about my juicing bar, but I have a solid plan and I know it will work because I have the support of my family.

content.text: Hi there, doing well. How about yourself?
Pretty good! What's your favorite season?
Winter, because I love the snow and cold weather.
Me too! I love going skiing and snowboarding.
Me too! I also love spending time with my dog, Petrucci, during the winter.
That's awesome! I love dogs too. Do you have any hobbies?

I work from home, so I have a lot of time to spend with my dog, Petrucci. I also love to cook, and I'm really proud of my ability to persevere through difficult times and continue to succeed in my career.
That's great! I love cooking too. What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love making pasta dishes, and I'm also really good at making homemade pizza.
That sounds delicious! I love pizza.
Me too! I'm actually thinking about opening a juicing bar. Do you think that's a good idea?
I think that's a great idea! I'm sure it would be really successful.
Thanks! I'm really nervous about it, but I have a solid plan and I know it will work because I have the support of my family.
I'm sure it will be! You're very brave to start your own business.
Thanks! I'm excited to get started
